original_text: I looked, and I saw a figure like that of a man. From what appeared to be his waist down he was like fire, and from there up his appearance was as bright as glowing metal.
korean_text: 내가 보니 불 같은 형상이 있더라 그 허리 아래의 모양은 불 같고 허리 위에는 광채가 나서 단 쇠 같은데

sentences.original_text: and I saw a figure like that of a man
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사람의 형상과 같은 형체를 보았다

sentences.original_text: From what appeared to be his waist down
his appearance was as bright as glowing metal
